title: The Vacancy 2
description: It was just supposed to be a routine office job—but then I came face-to-face with the boss…I’d been playing it safe and I thought I was destined for a quiet life. That all changed when I took The Vacancy. Jonah Storm came into my life. My powerful and seductive boss, a wild, uncontrollable tempest—fixated on me. I tried to resist: I’d made my pact. But my own desire was too strong: I gave into the storm letting waves of his passion crash against my body willingly, willing him to go further. As he pulled me down into his world deeper and harder, my only fear was my dark secret—one that was coming to get me any moment now. It wasn’t until it was too late that his own secrets emerged: secrets that threatened to engulf me completely.I prayed that I would survive—no matter what the cost. But what price was I prepared to pay in the end?*Book two in the steamy, scandalous series*
author: Cael Percy
